Name: Borderlands Triple Pack
Overview: SHOOT AND LOOT AS YOU EXPLORE THE MAYHEM-FILLED WORLD OF BORDERLANDSacross three critically acclaimed games: Borderlands, Borderlands 2, plus the lunar madness of Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel! Experience the award-winning FPS-RPG series, including Handsome Jack's rise to power in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, his reign as maniacal Hyperion CEO in Borderlands and Borderlands 2, bazillions of guns and trademark cooperative gameplay, complete with all bonus add-on content!
